last_episode_to_air.name: Bake of Art
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sachiko, Brian, and Korey sculpt edible models of themselves – set atop fudge bases – with precision and flair before transforming famous paintings into mind-boggling edible masterpieces!

name: Baketopia
overview: Social media baking sensation Rosanna Pansino, creates viral-worthy challenges in a larger-than-life baking wonderland, complete with every ingredient and tool a baker could dream of! In each standalone episode, brilliant bakers must fill their carts with unique ingredients necessary to build trendsetting cakes and delectable desserts in hopes of impressing Rosanna and her "Cake Council" and winning $10,000.

episodes.name: Jelly Island
episodes.overview: Pavani, Gregory, and Lena create stunningly delicious cocktail-inspired cupcakes before they aim to blow the competition out of the water with dreamy, hand-sculpted tropical jelly cakes.

episodes.name: Frozen in Time
episodes.overview: Heather, Andrew, and Darlene cook up completely original, completely scrumptious ice cream sandwiches and gravity cakes that leave the judges hard-pressed to pick a single standout.

episodes.name: A Batch Made in Heaven
episodes.overview: Gelia, Harvey, and Dani craft hollow chocolate domes that melt away to reveal edible surprises sure to make the judges swoon. Next, they keep the spark alive with two-sided wedding cakes!

episodes.name: Fry Your Heart Out
episodes.overview: Piper, Anya, and Jamie put a unique spin on classic deep-fried carnival eats before transforming their favorite rides into dynamic and functional cakes that incorporate a mechanical moving element.

episodes.name: Cereal-ously Delicious!
episodes.overview: Rockii, Randy, and Amanda create cream-filled delights infused with cereal milk for a touch of childhood nostalgia before throwing the judges' taste buds for a loop with cakes made to look like savory foods.

episodes.name: Beasts of Baketopia
episodes.overview: Megan, Jon, and Jamie build fun and tasty cookie puzzles for the judges to assemble and enjoy before turning their complex 2D creations into delicious 3D cake masterpieces!

episodes.name: Easy as Pie-rates
episodes.overview: Michelle, Michael, and Jason hit the high seas to make deliciously mystical pirate pies before crafting treasure hunt cakes that tell a story – with a scrumptious surprise ending, of course!

episodes.name: Herb Your Enthuasiam
episodes.overview: Shruti, Frank, and Kathleen dig deep into the garden of vegan to craft plant-based French macarons and botanical-themed cakes with alternative ingredients.

episodes.name: Baby, You Can Drive My Cake
episodes.overview: Camisha, Kim, and Jamie put the pedal to the metal to make remote-controlled cakes that take the judges for a wild ride. Next, they scramble to find a 3D object within Baketopia to incorporate into delicious desserts!

episodes.name: Bakers of the Galaxy
episodes.overview: Carolina, Justin, and Rhamani look to Mother Nature for inspiration as they top homemade donuts with a trendy galaxy glaze before rocking the judges' socks off with vibrant and ambitious geode cakes!

episodes.name: Fake It 'Til You Cake It
episodes.overview: Sandra, Jeasy, and Michael take on tiny cakes with big, ambitious flavors before using a personal object to craft hyper-realistic cakes that make the judges do a double take!

episodes.name: Bake of Art
episodes.overview: Sachiko, Brian, and Korey sculpt edible models of themselves – set atop fudge bases – with precision and flair before transforming famous paintings into mind-boggling edible masterpieces!
